T02D2215:209a-1: tattva pra d'i pam n'a ma s'a dha no pi ka aa ti /
T02D2215:209a-3: de kho na nyid sgron ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs pa /
T02D2215:209a-4: dpal rdo rje can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2215:209a-5: gang zhig gis ni bde ba thob cing sdug bsngal spong 'dod pa //
T02D2215:209a-6: de yi sa bon nor bu bzhin du bsgrub phyir bde ba'i mchog nyid la ni rab btud de //
T02D2215:209b-0: sgrub pa'i thabs @209b mchog de nyid sgron ma 'di ni gsang ba'i rgyud rnams la //
T02D2215:209b-1: brten cing gzhan yang gang las 'ongs pa de nyid bdag gis bshad par bya //
T02D2215:209b-2: gang zhig gis ni legs pa'i don gsung ba ni kun la gsal ma byas //
T02D2215:209b-3: de byas pa min mthong ba 'dir ni gsang ba 'di la dga' ba skyes //
T02D2215:209b-4: gang zhig sdug bsngal spang 'dod de la thas rnams med 'gyur zhing //
T02D2215:209b-5: bde ba thob pa'i thabs ni de 'dra de las zlog byed pa //
T02D2215:209b-6: thabs mchog dam pa 'di bstan 'di la gus par gyis //
T02D2215:209b-7: lta spyod dbang dang dam tshig ldan //
T02D2215:209b-8: yon tan gzhan gyis nyer brgyan pa'i //
T02D2215:209b-9: rnal 'byor snod can gang zhig gis //
T02D2215:209b-10: yang dag byang chub yid la gzhug / ri dang yul khams la sogs pa'i //
T02D2215:209b-11: yon tan thams cad ldan pa'i gnas //
T02D2215:209b-12: mngon sum grags pas ma smad pa //
T02D2215:209b-13: der ni nye bar 'du nas ni //
T02D2215:209b-14: dang por bgegs rnams bskrad par bya //
T02D2215:209b-15: skad cig phyag na rdo rje gsal //
T02D2215:209b-16: 'di yis gdug pa can rnams la //
T02D2215:209b-17: gzhan du 'gro ba'i bka' bsgo la //
T02D2215:209b-19: rdo rje 'khor lo'i thog gis gsad //
T02D2215:209b-20: de nas rang 'od mdun byung las //
T02D2215:209b-21: sna tshogs rdo rje 'bar ba bsam //
T02D2215:209b-22: de yis khro bo'i khang pa 'bu bas //
T02D2215:209b-23: yang na bdag las khams gsum rgyal //
T02D2215:209b-24: khro bo de spros 'byung po bkug / phur bus mdun du btab byas nas //
T02D2215:209b-25: de ni 'byung po 'dul ba'i mchog / yang na rang gi gnas dag tu //
T02D2215:209b-26: bcing dang gtub pa'i las byas nas //
T02D2215:209b-27: de ni myur du bzlog pa yin ;
T02D2215:209b-28: / de 'og khro bo'i khang pa bsgom //
T02D2215:209b-29: phyi nas bgegs rnams gso bar bya //
T02D2215:209b-30: yang na khang pa med dang thog / tsha tsha 'khrug pa'i rnam pa la //
T02D2215:209b-32: mtshams bcad pa yi man ngag go //
T02D2215:209b-34: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji srid du mtshams bcad pa'i dam tshig go //
T02D2215:209b-35: gang tshe mtshams kyi cho ga rdzogs //
T02D2215:209b-36: de nas bla ma mchod pa brtsam //
T02D2215:209b-37: rang snying mdun gyi nyi ma la //
T02D2215:209b-38: bla ma bkug ste 'od du zhu //
T02D2215:209b-39: de las rdo rje 'chang chen sku //
T02D2215:210a-2: phyag btsal ba dang mchod pa dang //
T02D2215:210a-3: sdig bshags sdom pa bzung ba dang //
T02D2215:210a-4: lus dbul dge rtsa bsngo byas na //
T02D2215:210a-6: bla ma mchod pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02D2215:210a-7: bde gshegs mchod pa'i cho ga brtsams //
T02D2215:210a-8: sa man dza yi sngags byung ba'i //
T02D2215:210a-9: 'od kyis dpal ldan gos sngon can //
T02D2215:210a-10: 'khor bcas mdun du spyan drangs te //
T02D2215:210a-11: gdan la bzhugs par gsol ba gdab //
T02D2215:210a-12: de nas spos dang me tog dang //
T02D2215:210a-13: mar me dri chab la sogs pa //
T02D2215:210a-14: dngos dang yid kyi mchod pa rnams //
T02D2215:210a-15: ci nus par ni dbul bar bya //
T02D2215:210a-16: de 'og sdig pa bshags pa dang //
T02D2215:210a-17: sdom pa ni gzung bar bya //
T02D2215:210a-18: yi rang ba dang bskul ba dang //
T02D2215:210a-19: gsol gdab rang gi lus dbul zhing //
T02D2215:210a-20: dge rtsa byang chub chen por bsngo //
T02D2215:210a-21: bdag las sprul pa'i lha tshogs kyis//
T02D2215:210a-22: sems can kun gyi don byed bsam //
T02D2215:210a-23: phyi ma'i dus kyi smon lam gdab //
T02D2215:210a-24: sems can don bya'i bsam pa bskyed //
T02D2215:210a-25: tshad med bzhi yang bsgom par bya //
T02D2215:210a-26: de la nan tan cher bskyed nas //
T02D2215:210a-27: sdig pa sbyong par byed pa dang //
T02D2215:210a-28: thun mong dngos grub kun 'grub cing //
T02D2215:210a-29: de la sogs pa'i yon tan tshogs //
T02D2215:210a-31: zhes pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T02D2215:210a-32: chen po'i ji srid du bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags
T02D2215:210a-34: gzhan yang yang dag bshad bya ba //
T02D2215:210a-35: ji srid bsod nams tshogs rdzogs nas //
T02D2215:210a-36: ye shes tshogs rnams bshad bya ste //
T02D2215:210a-37: dang po nyid nas rang bzhin med //
T02D2215:210a-38: de ltar mos par byed pa dang //
T02D2215:210a-39: yang na snying ga'i yi ge las //
T02D2215:210a-40: 'od byung bdag nyi zhu gyur te //
T02D2215:210a-42: de la dmigs nas bsgoms pa'i tshe //
T02D2215:210a-43: gzhan pa'i yul rnams rang bzhin gzhag de lar /
T02D2215:210a-44: yul ni gang la'ang mi gtad de //
T02D2215:210a-45: rten yang gang la'ang bcas pa med //
T02D2215:210a-46: ces pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T02D2215:210a-47: chen pos 'di ni ji srid du ye shes kyi
T02D2215:210a-48: tshogs bsags pa'i dam tshig chen po'o //
T02D2215:210b-0: de ltar tshogs gnyis bsags @210b gyur na //
T02D2215:210b-1: gang zhig bskyed pa'i sbyor ba ni //
T02D2215:210b-2: yam dang bam dang lam las dang //
T02D2215:210b-3: sum dang bh'um las byung ba yi //
T02D2215:210b-4: rlung dang chu yi dkyil 'khor dang //
T02D2215:210b-5: sa gzhi ri rab sting dag tu //
T02D2215:210b-6: gzhal yas khang pa bsam byas te //
T02D2215:210b-7: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D2215:210b-8: padma brgyad kyis yang dag brgyan ;
T02D2215:210b-9: / gru chad bzhis brgyan par khyams dang //
T02D2215:210b-10: dra ba dra phyed pha gu dang //
T02D2215:210b-11: dril bu dar dpyangs la sogs pa //
T02D2215:210b-12: phyi dang nang gi rgyan gyis mdzes //
T02D2215:210b-13: dbus su nyi zla padma'i steng //
T02D2215:210b-14: h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje 'bar //
T02D2215:210b-15: de las dpal ldan gos sngon sku //
T02D2215:210b-16: zhal gcig phyag gnyis mthing ga'i mdog / dbu la sprul brgyad gdangs ka can //
T02D2215:210b-17: sangs rgyas lnga yis dbu brgyan cing //
T02D2215:210b-18: gnas lngar sku lnga'i mtshan ma can //
T02D2215:210b-19: spyan gsum me yi mdog 'dra zhing //
T02D2215:210b-21: ljags ni glog bzhin myur 'dril zhing //
T02D2215:210b-22: zhal nas sbrul nag gsol ba'i tshul //
T02D2215:210b-23: sbrul nag se ral kha la gzed //
T02D2215:210b-24: sbrul ser chun pos rkang lag brgyan //
T02D2215:210b-25: dmar po yis ni ska rags byas //
T02D2215:210b-26: gsus khyim che zhing gsus pa 'phyang //
T02D2215:210b-27: sku smad gos sngon sham thabs can //
T02D2215:210b-28: rdo rje khros ma sku la'ang 'khril //
T02D2215:210b-29: gnyis su med par gyur pa dang //
T02D2215:210b-30: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas spyan drangs te //
T02D2215:210b-31: mchod dang bstod pas mnyes byas nas //
T02D2215:210b-32: don chen 'di yis gsol ba btab //
T02D2215:210b-33: ae ma ho dpal ldan gos sngon can //
T02D2215:210b-34: lus kyi rtog pa bsal ba'i phyir //
T02D2215:210b-35: thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis //
T02D2215:210b-36: bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol //
T02D2215:210b-37: gsang ba'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das //
T02D2215:210b-38: bdag ni sems can don kun rtsom //
T02D2215:210b-39: gsang 'dzin rigs kyi bdag po yis //
T02D2215:210b-40: bdag las bde gshegs sku byin rlobs //
T02D2215:210b-41: dag dang yid la de bzhin du //
T02D2215:210b-42: gsol ba btab par byed pa yin / phyis ni gnas gsum byin brlabs te //
T02D2215:210b-43: bum pa la sogs dbang rnams blang //
T02D2215:210b-44: bde ba chen por rtag tu dgyes //
T02D2215:210b-45: de nas phyogs bcu'i lha mo yis //
T02D2215:210b-46: bstod pa glu yis skul bar byed //
T02D2215:210b-47: aa la la la la ho /
T02D2215:211a-1: bde ba chen po gsang ba mchog ni nyams dga' nas //
T02D2215:211a-2: bcom ldan gsang mchog thugs rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02D2215:211a-3: ma rig rmongs pa yongs su bsal ba'i phyir //
T02D2215:211a-4: 'bar ba'i sku bzhis rtag tu 'gro ba'i don la spyod //
T02D2215:211a-5: aa la la la la ho ;
T02D2215:211a-6: / ma h'a gu hya p'u dzo pa stha sa ma ya /
T02D2215:211a-7: tsitta shu kra su ka aa la la la la ho zhes bskul lo //
T02D2215:211a-8: 'od las yongs su sad gyur te //
T02D2215:211a-9: rdo rje padma byin brlabs nas //
T02D2215:211a-10: lha mos bskul dang dga' ba yis //
T02D2215:211a-12: snyoms par zhugs nas bha ga la//
T02D2215:211a-13: sum cu'am ni nyi shu lnga //
T02D2215:211a-14: bcu sogs yum gyi bha gar bskyed //
T02D2215:211a-15: de la so so'i sngags kyis gdon //
T02D2215:211a-16: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta kro dha n'i l'am ba ra dha ra h'um /
T02D2215:211a-17: aom badzra kro dha n'i l'am ba ra dha ra h'um /
T02D2215:211a-18: aom ratna kro dha n'i l'am ba ra dha ra h'um /
T02D2215:211a-19: aom padma kro dha n'i l'am ba ra dha ra h'um /
T02D2215:211a-20: aom karma kro dha n'i l'am ba ra dha ra h'um ;
T02D2215:211a-21: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta kro dh'i shva ri n'i l'am ba ra dhva ra h'um /
T02D2215:211a-22: aom badzra kro dha tree lokya bi dz'a ya h'um /
T02D2215:211a-23: aom ma h'a k'a la bha ra santi na h'um /
T02D2215:211a-24: aom bi r'u dha k'a ya h'um /
T02D2215:211a-25: aom bi r'u paksha ye h'um /
T02D2215:211a-32: aom badzra a'a lo ke hr'i:/
T02D2215:211a-39: shar du sangs rgyas gos sngon can //
T02D2215:211a-40: zhal dang sku ni dkar la 'tsher //
T02D2215:211a-41: 'khor lo dang ni dril bu bsnams //
T02D2215:211a-42: sbrul dkar pos ni rnam par brgyan ;
T02D2215:211a-43: / lhor ni rin chen gos sngon can //
T02D2215:211a-44: zhal dang sku ni ser la 'tsher //
T02D2215:211a-45: rin po che dang dril bu bsnams //
T02D2215:211a-46: sbrul ser pos ni sku la brgyan //
T02D2215:211a-47: nub tu padma gos sngon can //
T02D2215:211a-48: zhal dang sku ni dmar la 'tsher //
T02D2215:211a-49: padma dang ni dril bu bsnams //
T02D2215:211a-50: sbrul dmar pos ni sku la brgyan //
T02D2215:211a-51: byang du las kyi gos sngon can //
T02D2215:211a-52: zhal dang sku ni ljang la 'tsher //
T02D2215:211a-53: rgya gram dang ni dril bu bsnams //
T02D2215:211a-54: sbrul ljang pos ni sku la brgyan //
T02D2215:211a-55: khro bo 'di dag thams cad kyang //
T02D2215:211a-56: dbu la sangs rgyas bzhi yis brgyan //
T02D2215:211a-57: yum bzhi yis ni legs par 'khyud //
T02D2215:211b-0: kun kyang gtso @211b bo'i cha lugs can //
T02D2215:211b-1: sngags kyi dbang po gzhan rnams kyang //
T02D2215:211b-2: so so'i gnas su bskyed par bya //
T02D2215:211b-3: zhes pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T02D2215:211b-4: chen pos ji srid du gtso bo dang 'khor bskyed
T02D2215:211b-6: ji srid bskyed pa rdzogs gyur nas //
T02D2215:211b-7: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas spyan drangs te //
T02D2215:211b-8: mdun du gnas la mchod pas mnyes //
T02D2215:211b-9: rdo rjes gsol ba gong bzhin gdab //
T02D2215:211b-10: de nas bdag la bstim pa'am //
T02D2215:211b-11: yang na lha mos dbang bskur phyir //
T02D2215:211b-12: gnas gsum byin brlab byas pa'am //
T02D2215:211b-13: yang na gsum 'dus sbyong ba bya ;
T02D2215:211b-14: / de ltar byas nas rang gi sku //
T02D2215:211b-15: dmigs dang gsal ba'i cho ga bya //
T02D2215:211b-16: 'dis ni rang gi rnam rtog bzlog / ces pa
T02D2215:211b-17: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
T02D2215:211b-18: ji srid du bskyed pa'i sku byin gyis brlab pa'i
T02D2215:211b-20: gang zhig rgyas la ma dad pa'i ;
T02D2215:211b-21: / gang zag la ni sbyor 'di bstan //
T02D2215:211b-22: sngon du bla ma sangs rgyas la //
T02D2215:211b-23: phyag 'tshal ba dang bshags byas nas //
T02D2215:211b-24: yang dag byang chub yid la bzhag / de nas 'byung ba gzhal yas bcas //
T02D2215:211b-25: nang du cho ga gsum las byung //
T02D2215:211b-26: gtso bo'i sku dang sku bzhi ni //
T02D2215:211b-27: rang rang yum dang bcas pa bskyed //
T02D2215:211b-28: bcu las gzhan pa thams cad kun //
T02D2215:211b-29: bsdus pa'i skabs su spang bar bya //
T02D2215:211b-31: mchod dang dbang la sogs spangs te //
T02D2215:211b-32: bstim pa yi ni sbyor ba bya //
T02D2215:211b-33: zhes pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T02D2215:211b-34: chen pos ji srid du sbyor ba bsdus pa'i dam
T02D2215:211b-35: tshig chen po'o // gzhan yang shin tu bsdus pa ni //
T02D2215:211b-36: dang por gzhan gyi don bya dang //
T02D2215:211b-37: rang nyid 'bras thob bsam pa bskyed //
T02D2215:211b-38: stong pa'i ngang las gcig par gyis //
T02D2215:211b-39: gzhal yas gtso bo dang bcas pa //
T02D2215:211b-40: rim pa'am ni cig car gyis //
T02D2215:211b-42: ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas ni //
T02D2215:211b-43: gnyis med gyur nas sems gzung ba //
T02D2215:211b-44: yang na sngags kyi sbyor ba byas //
T02D2215:211b-45: tshogs dang gtor ma la sogs pa //
T02D2215:211b-46: de la de yi sbyor ba bya //
T02D2215:212a-1: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ji srid du sbyor ba shin tu bsdus pa'i dam tshig chen po'o //
T02D2215:212a-2: de ltar sbyor ba'i don bstan nas //
T02D2215:212a-3: sems gzung rim pa bstan pa ni //
T02D2215:212a-4: dang po bla ma mchod la brten //
T02D2215:212a-5: gnyis pa bde gshegs brten pa ste //
T02D2215:212a-6: gsum pa rlung la sogs la brten //
T02D2215:212a-7: bzhi pa yi ge lnga pa la //
T02D2215:212a-8: rdo rje drug pa sku la brten //
T02D2215:212a-9: de nas 'khor lo brten pa ni //
T02D2215:212a-10: dbang po rab 'bring bye brag gis //
T02D2215:212a-11: dus gcig pa'am rim gyis byed //
T02D2215:212a-12: de nas dbang bskur byin brlab dang //
T02D2215:212a-13: bstim pa'i sbyor la brten pa yin //
T02D2215:212a-14: yang na dus kyi bye brag ni //
T02D2215:212a-15: gang zhig bla ma la sogs pa //
T02D2215:212a-16: dang po'i dus kyi rnal 'byor pas //
T02D2215:212a-17: rjes su dran no skad cig dang //
T02D2215:212a-18: skad cig bcu dang brgya dang ni //
T02D2215:212a-19: stong dang thun phyed thun gcig dang //
T02D2215:212a-20: thun mtshams med pa'i bar du'o //
T02D2215:212a-21: zhes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
T02D2215:212a-22: pos ji srid du sems gzung bar rim pa'i dam
T02D2215:212a-23: tshig chen po'o // sems gzung ched du byas pa yis //
T02D2215:212a-24: de yi thabs ni bshad bya ste //
T02D2215:212a-26: nyon mongs dgra ni spang bar bya //
T02D2215:212a-27: dag pa'i dbang du 'dod pa yis //
T02D2215:212a-28: dang por rtog pa spang bar bya ;
T02D2215:212a-30: sems ni phyi dang nang du byung //
T02D2215:212a-32: de bzhin nang du gzhug pa'ang //
T02D2215:212a-33: sems gzung don du byed pa yin //
T02D2215:212a-34: gzhan yang rnal 'byor gang zhig gis //
T02D2215:212a-35: khams gsum la sogs shes pa dag //
T02D2215:212a-36: ral gri yang ni sbyar bar bya //
T02D2215:212a-37: dpal ldan gsang ba mchog sgrub pas //
T02D2215:212a-38: gtso bo 'khor dang bcas gsal nas //
T02D2215:212a-39: mi 'gyur mchog gi cho ga bya //
T02D2215:212a-40: gang zhig la ni gang gsal ba //
T02D2215:212a-41: de la dmigs la bsgom par bya //
T02D2215:212a-42: ma gsal bar du bskyed cing bsgom //
T02D2215:212a-43: phyag tsam gsal na phyag la dmigs //
T02D2215:212a-44: gnyis dang gsum la sogs pa yang //
T02D2215:212a-45: gsal 'gyur de la dmigs par bya //
T02D2215:212a-46: gtso bo gsal na gtso bo ste //
T02D2215:212a-47: 'khor la yang ni de bzhin no //
T02D2215:212a-48: thams cad gsal na kun la dmigs //
T02D2215:212a-49: thams cad gsal bar ma gyur na //
T02D2215:212b-0: sdig pa zhi @212b dang bsod nams spel //
T02D2215:212b-1: zhi dang rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg bya //
T02D2215:212b-2: res gsal res mi gsal gyur na //
T02D2215:212b-3: bgegs rnams bzlog pa'i las bya'i phyir //
T02D2215:212b-4: drag po yi ni sbyin sreg dang //
T02D2215:212b-5: tshogs kyi 'khor lo la sogs bya //
T02D2215:212b-6: de bzhin bskrad dang mnan pa dang //
T02D2215:212b-7: bsrung pa'i mchog kyang bya ba yin //
T02D2215:212b-8: phyag gnyis gsal bar ma gyur na //
T02D2215:212b-9: phyag mtshan gyis ni gsal bar bya //
T02D2215:212b-10: phyag mtshan gsal bar ma gyur na //
T02D2215:212b-11: phyag mtshan 'od kyis gsal bar bya //
T02D2215:212b-12: spyan rnams gsal bar ma gyur na //
T02D2215:212b-13: khrag gi zham chu 'bab pa dang //
T02D2215:212b-14: bkrag dang ri mo ldan pas gsal //
T02D2215:212b-15: zhal mdog gsal bar ma gyur na //
T02D2215:212b-16: stong gsum 'od kyis gang bar gsal //
T02D2215:212b-17: yang na thams cad gsal byas na //
T02D2215:212b-18: phra mo mig gsal gyur kyang sla //
T02D2215:212b-19: gang tshe gang gis mi gsal na //
T02D2215:212b-20: zas dang skom dang gnas dag gis //
T02D2215:212b-22: dmigs pa mi gsal bco ba gang //
T02D2215:212b-23: dang po skad cig rjes dran dang //
T02D2215:212b-24: rgyun la ji srid 'tsho bar du //
T02D2215:212b-25: sbyor ba 'di ni byed pa yin //
T02D2215:212b-26: dpal ldan gsal bar gyur nas ni //
T02D2215:212b-27: ji srid las rnams byed pa yin //
T02D2215:212b-28: zhes pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T02D2215:212b-29: chen pos ji srid du dmigs pa la sems gzung
T02D2215:212b-30: ba'o // des na bsgom pa bogs dbyung ni //
T02D2215:212b-31: ji srid dus kyi bogs dbyung ni //
T02D2215:212b-32: skad cig rjes dran gong du shes //
T02D2215:212b-33: dmigs pa bogs dbyung bshad bya ste //
T02D2215:212b-34: dang por dkar po ljang gu'i bar //
T02D2215:212b-35: re re dang ni lnga 'dus pa //
T02D2215:212b-36: kha dog la ni bogs dbyung ba'o //
T02D2215:212b-37: de las ri rab til 'bru'i bar //
T02D2215:212b-38: dbyibs kyi bogs dbyung dag tu 'dod //
T02D2215:212b-39: stong gsum gang dang gcig 'dus pa //
T02D2215:212b-40: grangs kyi bogs dbyung dag tu bshad //
T02D2215:212b-41: sku la ji ltar bogs phyin pa //
T02D2215:212b-42: de ltar thugs la bslab bya ste ;
T02D2215:212b-43: / kha dog dbyibs dang grangs de bzhin //
T02D2215:212b-44: gsung la yang ni de ltar ro //
T02D2215:212b-45: de lta'i sbyor ba bstan pa yang //
T02D2215:212b-46: gang zag rigs kyis rnam gnyis te //
T02D2215:212b-47: rkyen gyi dbang du 'gyur ba la //
T02D2215:212b-48: ji lta'i 'od kyis bdag rkyen byas //
T02D2215:213a-2: ji ltar bsam gtan 'phel byed pa //
T02D2215:213a-4: bogs dbyung man ngag yin par 'dod //
T02D2215:213a-5: de ltar bogs dbyung sbyor ba yis //
T02D2215:213a-7: de las byung ba'i sku yis ni ;
T02D2215:213a-8: / las rnams thams cad 'grub par byed //
T02D2215:213a-9: ces pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T02D2215:213a-10: chen pos ji srid du bsgom pa'i bogs dbyung ba'o
T02D2215:213a-11: // gang tshe bsgom la mi gzhol zhing //
T02D2215:213a-12: gsang sngags gtso bor byed pa la //
T02D2215:213a-13: sngags kyi nges pa bshad par bya ;
T02D2215:213a-14: / sngags bzlas pa ni rnam gnyis te //
T02D2215:213a-15: thun mong dang ni khyad par ro //
T02D2215:213a-16: thun mong sngags ni bshad bya ste //
T02D2215:213a-17: bdag dang gzhal yas 'khor bcas dmigs //
T02D2215:213a-18: gsal la dmigs pa'i bzlas pa'o //
T02D2215:213a-19: sdig pa dbyung dang bsreg pa dang //
T02D2215:213a-20: bkru ba'i don la rab dmigs nas//
T02D2215:213a-21: h'um dang ram dang ham bskul te //
T02D2215:213a-22: mgal me phreng ba nyi ma yis //
T02D2215:213a-23: gang zhig byed par 'gyur ba ni //
T02D2215:213a-24: rgyud rnams sbyor ba'i bzlas pa'o //
T02D2215:213a-25: gang tshe yum dang bzhi skor dang //
T02D2215:213a-26: mdun gyi dkyil 'khor nyis skor dang //
T02D2215:213a-27: 'khor gyi dbang du sum skor dang //
T02D2215:213a-28: gtso dang 'khor gyi bzlas pa dang ;
T02D2215:213a-29: / snying na btson 'dra'i bzlas pa la //
T02D2215:213a-30: mgal me phreng ba nyi ma'i tshul //
T02D2215:213a-32: khyad par bzlas pa bshad bya ste //
T02D2215:213a-33: sngags 'od dkyil 'khor rnams la phog / de las khro bo'i tshogs byung nas //
T02D2215:213a-34: len byed dgug pa'i bzlas pa'o //
T02D2215:213a-35: ral gri la sogs thog 'bebs dang //
T02D2215:213a-36: gcod gtub gsad pa'i bzlas pa'o //
T02D2215:213a-37: bdag las byung ba'i khro tshogs kyis //
T02D2215:213a-38: gsad pa'i sha rus mdun du bton //
T02D2215:213a-39: ha ha ru lu'i sgra sgrogs pa //
T02D2215:213a-40: bsnyen pa'i dus kyi bzlas pa'o //
T02D2215:213a-41: khro tshogs 'khor lo thogs pa yis //
T02D2215:213a-42: klad par 'khor lo bskor ba yis //
T02D2215:213a-43: smyo byed dus kyi bzlas pa'o //
T02D2215:213a-44: rnga mo can gyi khro tshogs kyis //
T02D2215:213a-45: bzung zhing khrid par byed pa ni //
T02D2215:213a-46: bskrad pa'i dus kyi bzlas pa'o //
T02D2215:213a-47: 'od zer dkar po'i tshogs byung nas //
T02D2215:213a-48: lha la sogs pa'i sdig pa sbyong //
T02D2215:213a-49: de ni zhi ba'i bzlas pa'o //
T02D2215:213b-0: @213b gang zhig gis ni bcud rnams bsdus //
T02D2215:213b-1: rang byung tshe yi yi ge gsos //
T02D2215:213b-2: bkrag dang gzi byin bsngos pas bskyed //
T02D2215:213b-3: rgyas pa'i dus kyi bzlas pa'o //
T02D2215:213b-4: sngags 'od rdo rje la sogs pas //
T02D2215:213b-5: gdul bya'i rkang dang spyi bor bsreg /'od zer gzhan gyis gsos 'debs pa//
T02D2215:213b-6: rengs pa'i dus kyi bzlas pa'o //
T02D2215:213b-7: 'od zer kha dog sna lnga las //
T02D2215:213b-8: spos sogs lha mo rnams kyis gang //
T02D2215:213b-9: gang la phul nas don grub pa //
T02D2215:213b-10: mchod pa'i dus kyi bzlas pa'o //
T02D2215:213b-11: gang zhig las ni 'od byung nas //
T02D2215:213b-12: bdag zhu der 'dus bde thob pa //
T02D2215:213b-13: gsang ba'i dus kyi bzlas pa ste //
T02D2215:213b-14: rnam dag don la rab dmigs pa //
T02D2215:213b-16: gsang sngags skyon rnams rab spangs nas //
T02D2215:213b-17: 'bras bu thob pa'i las byed pa'ang //
T02D2215:213b-19: zhes pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T02D2215:213b-20: chen po'i ji srid du rdo rje sngags bzlas pa
T02D2215:213b-22: gang zhig tshogs rnams rdzogs byed cing //
T02D2215:213b-24: tshogs kyi des ba bshad par bya //
T02D2215:213b-25: 'jig rten rdzas rnams ma lus pa //
T02D2215:213b-26: kun tshogs rnal 'byor lha grangs te //
T02D2215:213b-27: 'tsham pa dang ni mchod pa sogs //
T02D2215:213b-28: sngon 'gro sa chog la sogs rdzogs //
T02D2215:213b-29: de nas lha yi ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D2215:213b-30: mandala lnga dang bcu sogs la //
T02D2215:213b-31: me tog dang ni mchod pa bkram //
T02D2215:213b-32: de nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri //
T02D2215:213b-33: de tshe rgyal pos mtshams rnams bcad //
T02D2215:213b-34: tshogs bsags rgyal pos blang bar bya //
T02D2215:213b-35: med pa las byung phyag rgya yis //
T02D2215:213b-36: rgyal po bzhi ni thob bya ste //
T02D2215:213b-37: bde ba chen po nyid dag las //
T02D2215:213b-38: lha mos sad byas skur langs te //
T02D2215:213b-39: dkyil 'khor rgyas nas rgyal po len //
T02D2215:213b-40: de nas grub pa rdzogs gyur nas //
T02D2215:213b-41: rgyal po yis ni sems dpa' bskul //
T02D2215:213b-42: phyi rol 'khor lo bsdus byas nas //
T02D2215:213b-43: nang du so so'i mandala bkod //
T02D2215:213b-44: bdag gis 'jug pa de bzhin du //
T02D2215:213b-45: 'khor rnams dam pa'i don la 'jug / gang zhig gis ni rol mo dang //
T02D2215:213b-46: ldan pas tshogs ni grangs byas te //
T02D2215:213b-47: skom dang mchod pa sngon song nas //
T02D2215:214a-0: @214a * // tshogs kyang byin gyis brlab par bya //
T02D2215:214a-1: yam ram aa las rlung me thod //
T02D2215:214a-2: nang du sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga //
T02D2215:214a-3: yi ge gsum gyis legs sbyangs te //
T02D2215:214a-4: ye shes bdud rtsi bab gyur nas //
T02D2215:214a-5: bdag mchod dkyil 'khor mdun du mnyes //
T02D2215:214a-6: cho ga'i yan lag rdzogs par bya ;
T02D2215:214a-8: phyi rol du ni mchod par bya //
T02D2215:214a-9: de ni thun mong cho ga'o //
T02D2215:214a-10: khyad par cho ga bstan pa ni //
T02D2215:214a-11: zab par sbrul par brten pa dang //
T02D2215:214a-12: bzhi dang gsum du nges par sbyar //
T02D2215:214a-13: zhib la sogs sbyor ba ni //
T02D2215:214a-14: sngags kyi sbyor ba bzhin du sbyar //
T02D2215:214a-15: gang zhig 'di la rtag gnas nas //
T02D2215:214a-16: mchog 'grub gzhan gyis nus ma yin //
T02D2215:214a-17: zhes pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T02D2215:214a-18: chen pos ji srid du tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor
T02D2215:214a-19: ba'o // bdag po 'byor ba chung ba dang //
T02D2215:214a-20: slob dpon bsam gtan ldan pa la //
T02D2215:214a-21: tshogs kyi mchod pa bstan par bya //
T02D2215:214a-22: rdzas ni lnga nas bcu yi bar //
T02D2215:214a-23: slob dpon gcig dang gnyis kyis 'grub //
T02D2215:214a-25: yang na rgyas pa tshogs 'khor bzhin //
T02D2215:214a-26: dkyil 'khor gcig dang gnyis pa dang //
T02D2215:214a-27: bzhi yi bar yang mchod pa yin //
T02D2215:214a-28: slob dpon nus pa'i bye brag gis //
T02D2215:214a-29: las gzhan rtsom na gong ma bzhin //
T02D2215:214a-30: mi rtsom 'gyur na sdig pa sbyang //
T02D2215:214a-31: zhes pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T02D2215:214a-32: chen po'i ji srid du tshogs kyi mchod pa'i dam
T02D2215:214a-33: tshig go // de nas dpal ldan rdo rje can //
T02D2215:214a-34: gang gis bsgrub par 'dod pa des //
T02D2215:214a-35: sbyin sreg cho ga bshad par bya //
T02D2215:214a-36: sngon bya gzhan ni gzhan du ste //
T02D2215:214a-37: sa yi rigs bzhir thab khung bzhi //
T02D2215:214a-38: zlum po gru bzhi zla gam ae //
T02D2215:214a-39: thab khung dbyibs kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D2215:214a-40: dkar ser dmar dang nag po ni //
T02D2215:214a-41: thab khung gi ni kha dog go //
T02D2215:214a-43: thab khung mtshan ma zhes su bshad //
T02D2215:214a-45: mi dmigs dang las bhr'um du gyur //
T02D2215:214a-46: de las gzhal yas khang pa ni //
T02D2215:214a-47: gong ma'i kha dog dbyibs dang ldan //
T02D2215:214a-48: mchod rdzas mchod par shes bya ste //
T02D2215:214b-0: sreg rdzas byin gyis @214b brlab pa yang //
T02D2215:214b-1: mi dmigs snod na sva yig las //
T02D2215:214b-2: so so de nyid rgyas pa la //
T02D2215:214b-3: ha ho hr'i:yis skyon rnams bsal //
T02D2215:214b-4: me lha bskyed pa'i rim pa ni //
T02D2215:214b-5: ae las gru gsum de nyid gsum //
T02D2215:214b-6: ram bcas yi ge bzhi ru gsal //
T02D2215:214b-7: pad steng de las me lhar gyur //
T02D2215:214b-8: kha dog bzhi yi bdag nyid las //
T02D2215:214b-9: so se'i rigs kyi dbu rgyan byas //
T02D2215:214b-10: lte bar gong ma'i sbyor ba ste //
T02D2215:214b-11: snying gar phyogs skyong bcu dang ldan //
T02D2215:214b-12: de nas ye shes me lha dgug / byin brlabs dbang bskur gzi byin bskyed //
T02D2215:214b-13: so so'i mchod pa dbul byas te //
T02D2215:214b-14: gzar bu rdo rje la sogs pa //
T02D2215:214b-15: kha dog dbyibs ldan byin gyis brlabs //
T02D2215:214b-16: de nas dbul ba'i man ngag kyang //
T02D2215:214b-17: shing gi 'od ni bskyed byas te //
T02D2215:214b-19: dkar gsum dang ni mngar gsum gyis //
T02D2215:214b-20: spyi dang so sor sdig pa 'byin //
T02D2215:214b-22: gong gis gnyis po so sor 'byin //
T02D2215:214b-23: nas thug 'o ma'i thug pa yis //
T02D2215:214b-24: re re'i gnas su sreg par byed //
T02D2215:214b-25: til gyis snying gi nad nas 'byin //
T02D2215:214b-26: tha ma'i bar gyis 'khru bar byed //
T02D2215:214b-27: yang na til gyis sgo dgur 'jug / rdzas de ser por byas pa la //
T02D2215:214b-28: dkar gsum gyis ni gzi byin bskyed //
T02D2215:214b-29: mngar gsum bsten bya gsal ba ste //
T02D2215:214b-31: ye shes bcud rnams spyi bor sdud //
T02D2215:214b-32: nas dang 'o ma'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2215:214b-33: 'gro bcud gnas rnams kun du sdud //
T02D2215:214b-34: tha ma d'ur ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2215:214b-35: mdzod spu'i snying ga'i h'um la sdud //
T02D2215:214b-36: tha ma mar gyi sbyor ba yis //
T02D2215:214b-38: dbang gi sbyor ba byed pa la //
T02D2215:214b-39: ba lang sha yi gtor ma dang //
T02D2215:214b-40: bcas pas sum skor la sogs kyis //
T02D2215:214b-41: myur du 'gugs shing dbang du sbyor //
T02D2215:214b-42: gsang ba'i las kyi cho ga ni ;
T02D2215:214b-43: / dang por sha yi khro ba ste //
T02D2215:214b-45: rus pas steng gi 'khor lo bri //
T02D2215:214b-47: 'bru nag chan gyis sprul pa khros //
T02D2215:214b-48: dug gi gtor mas 'gugs pa dang //
T02D2215:214b-49: de yi nang du gsod pa ni //
T02D2215:215a-2: de ltar me yi cho ga rdzogs //
T02D2215:215a-3: snying gar dgod pa'i lha rnams la //
T02D2215:215a-4: gong ma'i cho ga rdzogs byas te //
T02D2215:215a-5: bsdu dang gshegs su gsol byas nas //
T02D2215:215a-6: bzod gsol me yi sbyor ba byed //
T02D2215:215a-7: rdo rje me yi dam tshig yin //
T02D2215:215a-8: bsrung bzhi ba'i tshal gdab / tshe srid nam mkhar 'gro ba dang //
T02D2215:215a-10: rgyas pa'i cha la gdags pa'o //
T02D2215:215a-11: dgug pa dbang gi cha yin te //
T02D2215:215a-12: drag po'i las gzhan tha ma'i cha //
T02D2215:215a-13: 'di yis 'grub bya ba ma gtogs pa //
T02D2215:215a-15: zhes pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T02D2215:215a-16: chen po'i ji srid du me'i sbyor ba'i dam tshig
T02D2215:215a-17: go // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D2215:215a-18: 'phags mchog cho ga rdzogs byas te //
T02D2215:215a-19: gtor ma'i cho ga las byed pas //
T02D2215:215a-20: sha khrag rus pa 'bru la sogs //
T02D2215:215a-21: thams cad ma sbyang snod du blugs //
T02D2215:215a-22: bdag 'od sbyor bas rang bzhin med //
T02D2215:215a-23: de las yam ram aa ru gyur //
T02D2215:215a-24: nang du sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga //
T02D2215:215a-25: steng du rdo rje zla dkyil bcas //
T02D2215:215a-26: yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlab //
T02D2215:215a-27: dang por mdun gyi dkyil 'khor te //
T02D2215:215a-28: de nas dman dang bar ma dang //
T02D2215:215a-29: shin tu dman pa rim bzhin sbyin //
T02D2215:215a-30: gnas kun byin gyis brlab byas nas //
T02D2215:215a-31: lce ni rdo rjer bsams te dbul //
T02D2215:215a-32: 'di ni nyi shu rtsa gcig gam //
T02D2215:215a-34: khyad par gtor ma'i sbyor ba ni //
T02D2215:215a-35: sngags bzlas sbyor bar shes par bya //
T02D2215:215a-36: rang gi byang chub sems chu yis //
T02D2215:215a-37: ji ltar snying gi lha mchod pa //
T02D2215:215a-39: 'di yi sbyor bas byed pa yin //
T02D2215:215a-40: rdzas ma tshogs dang bsam gtan bral //
T02D2215:215a-41: sngon bya med dang go rims bral //
T02D2215:215a-42: 'di ni bar chad sbyor ba ste //
T02D2215:215a-43: mkhas pa rnams kyis spang bar bya //
T02D2215:215a-44: rdo rje'i lte ba 'khor lo can //
T02D2215:215a-45: bzhi po sbyor ba'i bdag nyid de //
T02D2215:215a-46: dran med mtha' yas dngos grub 'byung //
T02D2215:215a-47: bla na med pa'i gtor ma'o //
T02D2215:215a-48: gang zhig gtor ma'i rim pa la //
T02D2215:215a-49: mi brten dngos grub sbyor ba spangs //
T02D2215:215b-0: zhes pa 'di ni byang chub @215b sems dpa' sems
T02D2215:215b-1: dpa' chen po'i ji srid du gtor ma grub pa'i
T02D2215:215b-3: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste //
T02D2215:215b-4: mkhas pas lta ba'i dus dag tu //
T02D2215:215b-5: sgyu ma mig yor lta bu ste //
T02D2215:215b-6: dngos po'i lta bar rab bzlog nas //
T02D2215:215b-7: 'dod yon lnga la de ltar spyod //
T02D2215:215b-8: dmigs sogs sems dpa'i 'khor lo can //
T02D2215:215b-9: der ni lha mos rtag tu dgyes //
T02D2215:215b-10: ro ni mchog tu gyur pa ste //
T02D2215:215b-11: yid ni tshim par byed pa yin //
T02D2215:215b-12: nyan thos sdom pa'i 'khor lo dang //
T02D2215:215b-13: reg pa'i bar du sbyor ba spang //
T02D2215:215b-14: thabs mchog 'di yis byed pa ste //
T02D2215:215b-15: 'bras bu khyad par sgrub par byed //
T02D2215:215b-16: ces pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T02D2215:215b-17: chen po'i ji srid du lta ba la sogs pa'i
T02D2215:215b-18: dam tshig go // gang zhig gis ni gang zhig la //
T02D2215:215b-19: gang zhig byed par 'gyur ba ni //
T02D2215:215b-20: rnal 'byor mchog gi byed pa ste //
T02D2215:215b-21: snying ga'i 'khor lo chen po la //
T02D2215:215b-22: snying ga'i 'khor lo bcug nas ni //
T02D2215:215b-23: gnyis su med par gyur pa dang /
T02D2215:215b-24: lte ba'i rlung gis me 'bar bas //
T02D2215:215b-25: lha tshogs rnams ni smin byas te //
T02D2215:215b-26: lce yi 'khor lo chen po ni //
T02D2215:215b-27: byin za ru ni dmigs par bya //
T02D2215:215b-28: zas la sogs pa za dus su //
T02D2215:215b-29: zas ni sha lngar dmigs byas te //
T02D2215:215b-30: skom ni bdud rtsi lnga ru bsam //
T02D2215:215b-31: de las lag pa gzar bu gnyis //
T02D2215:215b-32: za ba'i dus su lha rnams la //
T02D2215:215b-33: zhal du gsol bas mnyes gyur nas //
T02D2215:215b-34: 'od kyis zhi ba'i dus dag tu //
T02D2215:215b-35: lus ngag yid kyi sgrib pa sbyong //
T02D2215:215b-36: rgyas pa'i dus su bcud rnams 'gugs /
T02D2215:215b-37: dbang dus thams cad dbang sdud de ;

T02D2215:215b-40: zas sogs bdud rtsi thams cad kyang //
T02D2215:215b-41: lag pa yis ni dbul ba dang //

T02D2215:219a-4: yang dag rtags rnams thob bya dang //
T02D2215:219a-5: log pa'i rtags ni spang bya'i phyir //
T02D2215:219a-6: rtags rnams bzlog pa'i cho ga yi //
T02D2215:219a-7: dam pa bdag gis bshad par bya //
T02D2215:219a-8: dang por byang chub sems bskyed de //
T02D2215:219a-9: gang du rtags kyi sbyor 'byung la //
T02D2215:219a-10: dga' ba dang ni mi dga'i sems //
T02D2215:219a-11: gnyis dang bral ba'i bsam pa bzlog / sems kyi 'khrul par lta ba dang //
T02D2215:219a-12: sgyu ma rang bzhin med pa yi //
T02D2215:219a-13: lta ba bzlog pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2215:219a-14: gong du dri chen sha chen dang ;
T02D2215:219a-15: / byang chub sems la spyod byed pa //
T02D2215:219a-16: spyod pas bzlog pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2215:219a-17: gang gis dam tshig rtag tu bsrung //
T02D2215:219a-18: de la shugs kyis sbyor ba med //
T02D2215:219a-19: dam tshig gis ni bzlog pa'o //
T02D2215:219a-20: yi dam lha la lus 'bul zhing //
T02D2215:219a-21: dam tshig nyams pa bshags pa dang //
T02D2215:219a-22: phyis ni sdom pa 'dzin byed pa //
T02D2215:219a-23: bshags pas dbang du sdud pa'o //
T02D2215:219a-24: de la drag po'i sbyor sngags dang //
T02D2215:219a-25: mi 'da' gsad ba'i sngags zlos pa //
T02D2215:219a-26: sngags kyis bzlog pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2215:219a-27: bdag las byung ba'i khro tshogs kyis //
T02D2215:219a-28: lus la mtshon cha'i char 'bebs dang //
T02D2215:219a-29: bdag 'dod dbyings las byung ba yis //
T02D2215:219a-30: thogs 'bebs sbyor ba rtsom pa dang //
T02D2215:219a-31: me dang chu yi 'khor lo yis //
T02D2215:219a-32: sbyor ba'i cho ga 'di byed pa //
T02D2215:219a-33: bsam gtan stobs kyis bzlog pa'o //
T02D2215:219a-34: yungs kar dang ni yungs nag dang //
T02D2215:219a-35: ske tshe shang tshe gu gul dang //
T02D2215:219a-36: drug 'bru la sogs sbyor ba yis //
T02D2215:219a-37: zlog par byed pa 'di dag ni //
T02D2215:219a-38: rdzas kyis bzlog pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2215:219a-39: yang na bdag nyid khro bo yi //
T02D2215:219a-40: mdun gyi snying du sems dpa' bskyed //
T02D2215:219a-41: las bcol rdo rje me 'bar ba //
T02D2215:219a-43: gang zhig de yi mgrin pa ru //
T02D2215:219a-44: yi ge a'a:ni bsam bya ste //
T02D2215:219a-45: spyi bo 'khor lo bskor ba yis //
T02D2215:219a-46: smros shig byas pas smra bar 'gyur //
T02D2215:219a-48: thod pa gsum gyi phyag rgya dang //
T02D2215:219a-49: dam tshig rdo rje sdigs mdzub dang //
T02D2215:219a-50: rgya gram 'khor lo'i sbyor ba yang //
T02D2215:219a-51: phyag rgya'i sbyor bas gsungs pa yis //
T02D2215:219b-0: bkra shis 'khor lo'i @219b sbyor ba yis //
T02D2215:219b-1: chags par 'gyur na rul myags dang //
T02D2215:219b-2: dum bu lang ling rnam par bsam //
T02D2215:219b-3: khro bor gyur na byams la sogs //
T02D2215:219b-4: gti mug la ni chos rnams byed //
T02D2215:219b-5: de bzhin mi dge'i gnyen po bsam //
T02D2215:219b-6: gzhan yang log pa'i don ston na //
T02D2215:219b-7: bdag dang chos dang chos can rnams //
T02D2215:219b-8: rang bzhin med pa sgyu mar bsam //
T02D2215:219b-9: des ni zhi dang gsal ba yin //
T02D2215:219b-10: gal te brda dang phyag rgya las //
T02D2215:219b-11: sogs pa'i sbyor ba ston gyur na //
T02D2215:219b-12: snying nang sems dpa' bcug nas ni //
T02D2215:219b-13: mi yi sbyor bas gsal 'gyur na //
T02D2215:219b-14: de la lan dang bcas par bya //
T02D2215:219b-15: thabs kyis ston pa shes rab ste //
T02D2215:219b-16: shes rab ston pa thams cad dang sbyar //
T02D2215:219b-17: gleng bslad pa la lan sbyin te //
T02D2215:219b-18: des ni zhing dang gsal bar yin / gsang ba'i rol pa'ang de bzhin no //
T02D2215:219b-19: de bas mkhas pas dus kun du //
T02D2215:219b-20: sbyor ba 'di ni bsam par bya //
T02D2215:219b-21: bdud rnams sbyor ba kha cig la ;
T02D2215:219b-22: / shes rab ma yin spyod pas rdzogs //
T02D2215:219b-24: sbyor ba 'di la bzlog pa yang //
T02D2215:219b-27: ces pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T02D2215:219b-28: chen po'i ji srid du bdud bzlog pa'i dam tshig
T02D2215:219b-29: chen po'o // gang zhig bdag dang gzhan rnams la //
T02D2215:219b-30: gdug pa brtson pa tshar bcad phyir //
T02D2215:219b-31: sbyor ba 'di ni bsam par bya //
T02D2215:219b-32: sa gzhi yid 'ong mdzes pa ru //
T02D2215:219b-33: sngon 'gro'i bya ba rdzogs pa dang //
T02D2215:219b-34: gang ltar 'dod pa'i sku bskyed de//
T02D2215:219b-35: zhi ba la sogs so so yi //
T02D2215:219b-36: bzlas dang bsdu ba rdzogs gyur nas //
T02D2215:219b-37: tshogs dang gtor mas bzlog par bya //
T02D2215:219b-38: de yis dul bar ma gyur na //
T02D2215:219b-39: rkang par ral gri g-yas pa la //
T02D2215:219b-40: g-yon pa lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2215:219b-41: mi g-yo g-yas g-yon stang stabs bya //
T02D2215:219b-42: bsam gtan de dang 'brel pa ste //
T02D2215:219b-43: ral gri'i gsang sngags bzlas pas 'grub //
T02D2215:219b-44: gdab pa yang ni de bzhin no //
T02D2215:219b-45: yang na gzir ba'i cho ga ni //
T02D2215:219b-46: nad pa'am ni gzugs dag la //
T02D2215:219b-47: dmigs pa legs par dbab bya ste //
T02D2215:219b-48: rkang pa g-yas la ri rab ste //
T02D2215:220a-2: rgyal chen phyogs skyong gong ma ste //
T02D2215:220a-4: bus mor chu srin rgyal mtshan te //
T02D2215:220a-5: gnas lngar khro bo lnga po bskyed //
T02D2215:220a-6: g-yon par lcags kyu'am rdo rje'o //
T02D2215:220a-7: dgug pa la sogs sbyor byas nas //
T02D2215:220a-8: snying gar mnan par gyur pa yis //
T02D2215:220a-10: mi bzod smre sngags 'don pa dang //
T02D2215:220a-12: yang na snying nang me dpung bskyed //
T02D2215:220a-14: phyogs skyong gang dang gang 'dul yang //
T02D2215:220a-16: khyad par klu yi sbyor ba yang //
T02D2215:220a-17: gzir ba mkha' lding lnga po ste //
T02D2215:220a-18: yang na snying pad 'bar ba brtsam //
T02D2215:220a-19: lnga la lnga ni legs gnas te //
T02D2215:220a-20: lnga po yi ni sbyor bas 'dzin //
T02D2215:220a-21: pus mo dpung pa rnam bzhi la //
T02D2215:220a-22: thogs med 'khor lo bzhi bsams te //
T02D2215:220a-23: rdo rjes bsreg cing lcags kyus 'dzin //
T02D2215:220a-25: gzhan yang sbyor ba dam pa ni //
T02D2215:220a-26: gang zhig bde gshegs skur gnas te //
T02D2215:220a-27: g-yas par rtse lnga thogs med lnga //
T02D2215:220a-28: g-yon par rtsa las byung ba'i steng //
T02D2215:220a-29: su las rin chen rdo rje stengs su //
T02D2215:220a-30: khom sha las byung rnam lnga bsam //
T02D2215:220a-31: 'od zer gyis ni legs bkug ste //
T02D2215:220a-32: nus dang ldan par byas nas ni //
T02D2215:220a-33: bdag 'od bu ga dgu sogs zhugs //
T02D2215:220a-34: lte ba'i 'khor lo bskul byas te //
T02D2215:220a-35: g-yas kyi rdo rjes spar byas nas //
T02D2215:220a-36: g-yon pas len par byed pa yin //
T02D2215:220a-37: g-yon sbyor shin tu rmad du byung //
T02D2215:220a-38: yang na nang du bsreg par bya //
T02D2215:220a-40: zangs sogs dmar po'i snod du bkod //
T02D2215:220a-41: de ni bdud rtsis gso bar bya //
T02D2215:220a-42: phyi nas rang gi gnas su bskyal //
T02D2215:220a-44: gnas brgyad du ni bsams byas te ;
T02D2215:220a-45: / bsregs pas rlung gis gtor gyur nas //
T02D2215:220a-46: bkrus pa byang chub thig le byas //
T02D2215:220a-47: dpal ldan skur gyur byin brlab cing //
T02D2215:220a-48: dbang thob sku yi gsang sngags bzlas //
T02D2215:220a-49: 'di yis gdugs ba sel ba yin //
T02D2215:220a-50: khyad par can gyis bdag dang gzhan //
T02D2215:220b-0: myur @220b du phan gnod las rnams byed //
T02D2215:220b-1: de bas 'di ni thabs kyi mchog / sbyor ba gzhan las rnyed ma yin //
T02D2215:220b-2: zhes pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T02D2215:220b-3: chen po'i ni srid du bgegs bzlog pa'i dam tshig
T02D2215:220b-4: chen po'o // gang zhig gdug pa 'dul 'dod pas //
T02D2215:220b-5: gsad pa'i cho ga dam pa ni //
T02D2215:220b-6: dur khrod la sogs 'jigs gnas su //
T02D2215:220b-7: drag po'i dkyil 'khor dug gis bris //
T02D2215:220b-8: rkang rjes gos la sogs pa la //
T02D2215:220b-9: gdug pa'i gzugs brnyan byas nas ni //
T02D2215:220b-10: de nyid snying gar ming rus gzhug / tsha ba bskyed pa'i sbyor ba bya //
T02D2215:220b-11: de nas tshon skud sna lngas bcing //
T02D2215:220b-12: rabs chad thod pa rlon pa ru //
T02D2215:220b-13: de ni gzhug par bya ba yin //
T02D2215:220b-14: de 'od las ni nrir [?] gyur te //
T02D2215:220b-15: de las gang yin gzugs su gyur //
T02D2215:220b-16: bdag las sprul pa'i khro bo'i tshogs //
T02D2215:220b-17: dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten bkang //
T02D2215:220b-18: rdo rje dgug pa'i sngags bzlas pas //
T02D2215:220b-19: lcags kyu la sogs bzhi po 'phros //
T02D2215:220b-20: gang yin de ru dgug byas te //
T02D2215:220b-21: las kyi rgya'am ri rab kyis //
T02D2215:220b-22: de yi steng nas mnan par bya //
T02D2215:220b-23: byin gyis brlab pa'i lha rnams kun //
T02D2215:220b-24: las kyi khro bos dbye ba dang //
T02D2215:220b-26: srog rtsa'i bdag po bram ze'i gzugs //
T02D2215:220b-27: gdug pa'i khro bo'i sbyar mas bdug / khros pa'i stobs kyis khrag 'byin cing //
T02D2215:220b-28: ro la za bar byed pa yin //
T02D2215:220b-29: bdag dang ye shes khro bo las //
T02D2215:220b-30: sprul pa thogs lnga sngags las byung //
T02D2215:220b-31: de lus gcod par byed pa dang //
T02D2215:220b-32: phye mar yang ni 'gyur ba yin //
T02D2215:220b-33: de dag kun gyi sbyor ba yis /
T02D2215:220b-34: 'grub par ma gyur pa rnams la //
T02D2215:220b-35: phye ma gsum gyis gsad pa yin //
T02D2215:220b-36: lcags phye zangs phyed rdo lcags la //
T02D2215:220b-37: thog chen sbyor ba'i las byas na //
T02D2215:220b-38: dkyil 'khor kun gyi sbyor ba yis //
T02D2215:220b-39: gsad par gyur pa gdon mi za //
T02D2215:220b-40: de yis gsad par ma gyur na //
T02D2215:220b-41: phur pa kho nas gsad par bya //
T02D2215:220b-42: lcags dang rigs mthun gyur pa la //
T02D2215:220b-43: khro bo de dang mthun byas nas //
T02D2215:220b-45: gang zhig ral gri'i sbyor ba dang //
T02D2215:220b-46: rdo rje tho ba'i sbyor ba yang //
T02D2215:221a-2: yang na gsad pa'i dam pa yin //
T02D2215:221a-3: yung sa kar dang ni yungs nag dang //
T02D2215:221a-4: de bzhin gdug pa'i 'bru rnams kun //
T02D2215:221a-5: khro chung sbyor bas 'grub pa yin //
T02D2215:221a-6: dug dang myos pa'i chur sbyar te //
T02D2215:221a-7: gdug pa sbrul nag sbyor ba yis //
T02D2215:221a-8: bkug cing kha ru blugs gyur nas //
T02D2215:221a-9: lus nang sbrul nag sbyor byas na //
T02D2215:221a-11: yang na ma mo'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2215:221a-12: bud med thod pa lcang lo'i nang //
T02D2215:221a-13: rims khrag dug dang bcas blugs na //
T02D2215:221a-14: snying nag ma mo'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2215:221a-15: khar blugs gyur na myos nas 'chi //
T02D2215:221a-16: thod par klad pa'i 'khor lo bskor //
T02D2215:221a-17: yang na mdze can thod pa ru //
T02D2215:221a-18: de la dgug pa sngon 'gro bas //
T02D2215:221a-19: mdzes can khrag gi sbyor ba yis //
T02D2215:221a-20: lus nang gang nas lcags sbrang ngam //
T02D2215:221a-21: lcags sdig srin bu la sogs pa //
T02D2215:221a-22: ba spu'i bu gar sbyor byas na //
T02D2215:221a-24: dug dang myos pa'i rims khrag la //
T02D2215:221a-25: lug dang glang gi khrag dag gis //
T02D2215:221a-26: smyo byed sbyor ba rab byas nas //
T02D2215:221a-27: gang du sha ba'i 'khor lor ldan //
T02D2215:221a-28: des ni lkugs par 'gyur ba yin //
T02D2215:221a-29: lce la ri rab sbyor ba bya //
T02D2215:221a-30: yang na mnan pa'i sbyor ba ni //
T02D2215:221a-31: byang du bltas pa'i chu mig tu //
T02D2215:221a-32: thod pa dum bu drug yod par //
T02D2215:221a-33: gang yin ming rus bcug byas te //
T02D2215:221a-34: dgug pa la sogs byas na ni //
T02D2215:221a-36: yang na bsam gtan kho na yis //
T02D2215:221a-37: gsang ba'i thabs ni bshad bya ste ;
T02D2215:221a-38: / dgug pa sngon du 'gro ba yis //
T02D2215:221a-39: mdun du za byed kha gdangs la //
T02D2215:221a-40: phur bu spyi bor btab byas nas //
T02D2215:221a-41: rkang par khrag byung za byed 'jig / de ltar byas na skya lam 'gyur //
T02D2215:221a-42: gsad pa'i cho ga dam pa yin //
T02D2215:221a-43: yang na spyi'u gtsug gyur pa la //
T02D2215:221a-44: mdun du spyi bsdus rdo rje ni //
T02D2215:221a-45: kha dog nag po 'bar ba la //
T02D2215:221a-46: me yi phreng bas bskor gyur te //
T02D2215:221a-47: sum skor 'od kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02D2215:221a-48: rdo rje spyi bor zhugs gyur nas //
T02D2215:221a-49: 'od zer snying nas sreg par byed //
T02D2215:221a-50: thig le dag kyang 'joms pa yin //
T02D2215:221a-51: yang na 'od zer nag pos yang //
T02D2215:221b-0: lte ba'i @221b 'khor lo bskul byas te //
T02D2215:221b-1: me 'bar stobs kyis bsreg pa dang //
T02D2215:221b-2: spyi bo'i khu ba bkug nas ni //
T02D2215:221b-3: rkang pa'i me nang sreg pa'am //
T02D2215:221b-4: yang na za byed kha ru sreg / yang na rdo rje'i yi ge gsal //
T02D2215:221b-5: spyi nas bshad par rdo rjes brdeg / bshang ba'i yi ge bshig pa yin //
T02D2215:221b-6: yang na snying nang ram las mes //
T02D2215:221b-7: me nang me yis sreg pas dang /
T02D2215:221b-8: thal bar byed pa rdo rje yin //
T02D2215:221b-10: yang na 'khor lo nag po'i steng //
T02D2215:221b-11: gang yin dngos su gsal byas nas //
T02D2215:221b-12: snying gi nang du sbrul nag po //
T02D2215:221b-13: bsam gyis mi khyab phu las byung //
T02D2215:221b-14: stong gsum sbrul nag bkug nas bstim //
T02D2215:221b-15: sbrul las lcags sbrang gze ma yis //
T02D2215:221b-16: ba spu'i bu ga nas phyung zhing //
T02D2215:221b-17: me yis bsreg par 'gyur ba yin //
T02D2215:221b-19: gzhan yang gsad pa'i bsam pa ni //
T02D2215:221b-20: lte ba'i yi ge bsams nas kyang //
T02D2215:221b-22: rdo rje phur bus steng nas rdeg /'od zer lcags gze'i tshul can gyis //
T02D2215:221b-23: yi ge dkrug cing sreg pa dang //
T02D2215:221b-24: gshegs pa'i sbyor ba byas pas 'grub //
T02D2215:221b-25: de phyir zab par bstan pa yin //
T02D2215:221b-26: yang ni snying gar nri bsam mam //
T02D2215:221b-27: ming yig dang por gnas pa las //
T02D2215:221b-28: 'od zer lnga yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D2215:221b-29: yi ge ma rungs byed pa yin //
T02D2215:221b-30: spyi bo nas ni rkang pa'i bar //
T02D2215:221b-31: mkhas pas 'od zer nag pos dgang //
T02D2215:221b-33: steng du g-yo zhing yi ge bsregs //
T02D2215:221b-34: nag po'i rdzas kyi sbyor ba byas //
T02D2215:221b-35: ram las byung ba'i gru gsum du //
T02D2215:221b-36: sbrul nag tshogs kyis bkang ba la //
T02D2215:221b-37: nang du gdul bya bkug gyur nas //
T02D2215:221b-38: lcags gze nyi ma'i sbyor ba bya //
T02D2215:221b-39: drag po chen po bdud chen dang //
T02D2215:221b-40: dbang phyug lha chen la sogs pa //
T02D2215:221b-41: sbyor ba 'di ni byas tsam gyis //
T02D2215:221b-43: yang na dbang phyug mthun chen gyis //
T02D2215:221b-44: rigs pa 'di yi sbyor ba la //
T02D2215:221b-45: zla ba zer la de dag gis //
T02D2215:221b-46: dmigs pa chu yi nang du 'bab //
T02D2215:221b-47: sbyor ba mchog la gnas byas nas //
T02D2215:221b-48: dug dang me yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D2215:222a-1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ji srid du gsang ba'i dam tshig chen po'o //
T02D2215:222a-2: gzhan yang dngos grub sbyor ba rnams //
T02D2215:222a-3: gang du mthar phyin byed pa yi //
T02D2215:222a-4: rdo rje'i sbyor la brten par bya //
T02D2215:222a-5: las bzhi'i rgyu las byung ba las //
T02D2215:222a-6: shin tu mdzes pa'i rdo rje byas //
T02D2215:222a-7: gang ltar 'dod pa'i dbyibs su bsgyur //
T02D2215:222a-8: 'od zhu h'um las byung ba yi //
T02D2215:222a-10: de las rdo rje thugs mchog sku //
T02D2215:222a-11: gnyis med thim nas byin brlabs dang //
T02D2215:222a-12: dbang bskur mchod dang bstod pa dang //
T02D2215:222a-13: las bcol sngags bzlas 'od du zhu //
T02D2215:222a-14: de las rdo rje kha dog lnga //
T02D2215:222a-15: gang gis las dang mthun par bskyed //
T02D2215:222a-17: rang gi rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas pas //
T02D2215:222a-18: ye shes rtags rnams bkug bya ste //
T02D2215:222a-20: gang zhig 'di yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D2215:222a-22: dril bu phreng ba la sogs pa'ang //
T02D2215:222a-23: lhag par gnas pa las byung las //
T02D2215:222a-24: 'di yis dngos grub thams cad kun //
T02D2215:222a-26: zhes pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T02D2215:222a-27: chen po'i ji srid du rdzas bsgrub pa'i dam tshig
T02D2215:222a-28: chen po'o // ji srid khrus kyi sbyor ba ni //
T02D2215:222a-29: gang gi bum pa sbyangs byas nas //
T02D2215:222a-30: padma bzhi nang gos sngon bskyed //
T02D2215:222a-31: bsgrub pa'i cho ga rdzogs gyur nas //
T02D2215:222a-32: dag pa'i sngags kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02D2215:222a-33: ye shes chu bo byin brlabs te //
T02D2215:222a-34: gang la bkrus pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D2215:222a-35: dngos grub thams cad 'byung ba yin //
T02D2215:222a-36: gang zhig dam pa'i don la gnas //
T02D2215:222a-37: lha mo rgyun 'bab chu bo yis //
T02D2215:222a-38: gang du bkrus pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D2215:222a-39: 'dod pa thams cad sgrub par byed //
T02D2215:222a-40: ces bya ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
T02D2215:222a-41: dpa' chen chen po'i ji srid du rdo rje khrus
T02D2215:222a-43: bsam gtan dag la mi gnas shing //
T02D2215:222a-44: rtag tu drag po'i sngags rtsom pa //
T02D2215:222a-45: de yis nor bu bzhin sgrub phyir //
T02D2215:222a-46: sngags kyi nges pa bshad par bya //
T02D2215:222a-47: aom na mo badzra p'a ni ma h'a yaksha se
T02D2215:222a-48: n'a pa ta ye badzra kro dha n'i l'am ba
T02D2215:222b-0: ra @222b dha ra h'um h'um phat /
T02D2215:222b-1: aom na mo sarba dharma ku ru bandha ye h'um phat /
T02D2215:222b-2: aom na mo badzra kro dh'i shva ri mu h'um h'um phat /
T02D2215:222b-5: ba sham ku ru na ma hr'i:h'um m'a ra ya m'a ra ya sha tr'um phat /
T02D2215:222b-6: aom stam bha ya stam bha ya h'um ba lim ba lim /
T02D2215:222b-8: kh'a ti kh'a hi aa k'a ro mu kham sarba
T02D2215:222b-9: dharm'a n'am a'a dya nutpanna ba na ye h'um phat
T02D2215:222b-10: / aom ratt'i sha ye dha ba ra tsa mu kham ku ru h'um phat /
T02D2215:222b-11: aom sarba de ba m'a ra ya tshinda tshinda h'um phat /
T02D2215:222b-14: ha na ha na h'um phat /
T02D2215:222b-15: ta th'a ya ta th'a ya h'um phat /
T02D2215:222b-16: dz'a la dz'a la h'um phat /
T02D2215:222b-17: su ru su ru h'um phat /
T02D2215:222b-18: mu ru mu ru h'um phat /
T02D2215:222b-19: n'a sha ya n'a sha ya h'um phat /
T02D2215:222b-20: grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um phat /
T02D2215:222b-21: ha sa ya na ha sa ya na h'um phat /
T02D2215:222b-22: ki li ki li m'a ra ya h'um phat /
T02D2215:222b-23: spho ta ya spho ta ya h'um phat /
T02D2215:222b-24: n'a ga r'a dza n'a ga raksha /
T02D2215:222b-25: yaksha ku ru sarba ra sha raksha raksha /
T02D2215:222b-26: bi dhvansa ya he bha ga b'an ku ru ku ru //
T02D2215:222b-27: ba sham ku ru h'um phat /
T02D2215:222b-28: aom aa pa sma ra bi na shi ka ra h'um h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2215:222b-29: pre ti ba ne sho ka h'um phat /
T02D2215:222b-30: aom shuddhe shuddhe bi shodha bi shodha ni /
T02D2215:222b-31: sarba p'a pam bi shodha ni h'um phat /
T02D2215:222b-32: aom dzva la dzva la sarba p'a pam da ha ni badzra dzva la h'um phat /
T02D2215:222b-33: aom gu la p'a ya gu la p'a ya //
T02D2215:222b-34: sarba p'a pam dharm'a shuddhe shuddhe h'um /
T02D2215:222b-35: aom grihna sarba sha tr'um m'a ra ya m'a ra
T02D2215:222b-36: ya n'a sha ya sarba da ha badzra h'um phat
T02D2215:222b-39: yaksha bittva na karma gho ru bittven m'a ra ya h'um phat /
T02D2215:222b-40: ces pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T02D2215:222b-41: chen po'i ji srid du rdo rje sngags bsgrub pa'i
T02D2215:222b-43: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D2215:222b-44: gang zhig mchog gi don bsgrub pa //
T02D2215:222b-45: de yis nor bu bzhin sgrub phyir //
T02D2215:222b-46: de nyid rgyan ni bshad par bya //
T02D2215:222b-47: gang zhig nor bu 'phel byed pa //
T02D2215:222b-48: de yis rtag tu don 'di bsam //
T02D2215:222b-49: snying gar bcu drug brgyad dam bzhi //
T02D2215:222b-50: dbu nas thabs dang shes rab 'bar //
T02D2215:222b-51: dkar zhing zlum pa'i thig le bsam ;
T02D2215:222b-52: /'byung bzhi dang po yi ge brgyad //
T02D2215:222b-53: g-yas dang g-yon du bsgom par bya //
T02D2215:222b-54: de las byung ba lnga'am bcus //
T02D2215:222b-55: thig le dag la brten nas ni //
T02D2215:222b-56: dbang po'i rgyu ba dgag par bya //
T02D2215:222b-58: gnas pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can //
T02D2215:223a-2: rnal 'byor bde ba myong bar byed //
T02D2215:223a-3: yang na snying ga nas byung ba //
T02D2215:223a-4: lnga'am khrag dang chu dang byang chub sems //
T02D2215:223a-5: mdung dang ral gri'i sbyor ba can //
T02D2215:223a-6: mgrin pa'i padma kha bye bsam //
T02D2215:223a-7: phyogs su gzhol ba slob pa ni//
T02D2215:223a-8: kha bye thig le 'gro 'od bdag /'byung dang 'jug pa 'dir bslabs nas //
T02D2215:223a-9: rnal 'byor bde ba myong bar byed //
T02D2215:223a-10: dre re'am ni lnga yi bar //
T02D2215:223a-11: slob ma rnal 'byor bde ba'i lam //
T02D2215:223a-12: snang mtha' yas kyi gnas dag na //
T02D2215:223a-13: bzhi bcu'am ni sum cu gnyis //
T02D2215:223a-14: bcu drug brgyad kyi rnam pa la //
T02D2215:223a-15: 'byung bzhi a'a li bcu drug ni //
T02D2215:223a-16: g-yas dang g-yon du 'khor bar byed //
T02D2215:223a-17: gang zhig dbus nas dpa' bo ste //
T02D2215:223a-18: dbang po'i rgyu ba 'gog pa dang //
T02D2215:223a-19: bde chen kha bye de bzhin du //
T02D2215:223a-21: rtag tu bde ba chen po bsgrub //
T02D2215:223a-22: gang zhig spyi bo'i khang pa ru //
T02D2215:223a-23: bdun cu gnyis sam drug cu bzhi //
T02D2215:223a-24: sum cu rtsa gnyis brgyad dang bzhi //
T02D2215:223a-25: a'a li gnyis dang k'a li gcig /'byung ba bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
T02D2215:223a-26: steng dang 'og tu rgyu ba'i tshul //
T02D2215:223a-28: yang na tshangs dang smin mtshams par //
T02D2215:223a-29: rtsa lnga kha 'byed sbyor bar byed //
T02D2215:223a-30: lte ba dpa' bo gsang ba'i bdag / brgyad dang nyi shu'i sbyor ba'am //
T02D2215:223a-31: phyed bcas a'a li k'a li 'bar //
T02D2215:223a-32: gang zhig dpa' bo rlung stobs kyis //
T02D2215:223a-33: rtsa lnga snying gar slob pa dang //
T02D2215:223a-34: dbang po 'gegs par byed pa yin /
T02D2215:223a-35: kha cig slob pa'i dus dag tu //
T02D2215:223a-36: nyi ma rdo rje sbyor ba ste //
T02D2215:223a-37: la la yi ge thig ler 'dod //
T02D2215:223a-38: bzhi ni so sor slob pa ste //
T02D2215:223a-39: gcig ni mdud par slob pa'o //
T02D2215:223a-40: gang zhig 'di la rtag gnas nas //
T02D2215:223a-41: bde ba chen po sgrub par byed //
T02D2215:223a-42: gzhan gyi sbyor bas ma gsungs so //
T02D2215:223a-43: yang na dbang po 'gegs pa dang //
T02D2215:223a-44: rtsa lnga'i sbyor ba ma gsungs te //
T02D2215:223a-45: gang zhig 'di yi sbyor la gnas //
T02D2215:223a-46: dbab dang bzlog pas 'grub pa yin //
T02D2215:223a-47: ji srid 'khor lo gong ma la //
T02D2215:223a-48: de yi sbyor ba ma gsungs te //
T02D2215:223a-49: gang zhig rdo rje'i sbyor ba yi //
T02D2215:223b-0: bzhi po 'di ni brtsam @223b par bya ;
T02D2215:223b-1: / sum cu gnyis sam bcu drug dang //
T02D2215:223b-2: brgyad dang bzhi yi rnam pa la //
T02D2215:223b-3: bzhi po kho na'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2215:223b-4: dbab dang bzlog par bya ba'am //
T02D2215:223b-5: brgyad dang gnyis la brten pa dag / dbab pa gong 'og gzhan du sbyor //
T02D2215:223b-6: dbab pas dga' ba bskyed pa dang //
T02D2215:223b-7: bzlog pas dga' ba bskyed pa dang //
T02D2215:223b-8: bar du skye dbar gyur pa dang //
T02D2215:223b-9: gang zhig rgyun la skye ba dang //
T02D2215:223b-10: 'di dag rigs kyi dbang du gsungs //
T02D2215:223b-11: gang zhig rigs gzhan sbyor ba la //
T02D2215:223b-12: rigs gzhan pho nya'i sbyor ba bya //
T02D2215:223b-13: gang tshe rang gi rigs mthun pa //
T02D2215:223b-14: byin gyis brlabs nas gnyis med sbyor //
T02D2215:223b-15: rtag tu dam pa bde ba 'bab //
T02D2215:223b-16: 'di yi sbyor bas dga' ba rnams //
T02D2215:223b-17: rim skye phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'grub //
T02D2215:223b-18: gang zhig 'di yi sbyor ba yang //
T02D2215:223b-19: las las bskyed pa'i bu mo dang //
T02D2215:223b-20: ye shes bu mo sprul pa dang //
T02D2215:223b-21: g-yon gyi yum dang snying ga las //
T02D2215:223b-22: byung ba'i bu mo sbyor byed pa //
T02D2215:223b-24: ye shes skyed par byed pa yin //
T02D2215:223b-25: tha ma'i las kyi dus dag tu //
T02D2215:223b-26: rked pa thig gus bcing ba dang //
T02D2215:223b-27: dbugs kyi lcags kyus bzlog pa yang //
T02D2215:223b-29: gang zhig sbyor ba gzhan dag kyang //
T02D2215:223b-30: nyi ma me ni lte bar 'bar //
T02D2215:223b-31: spyi bo'i byang chub sems bkug nas //
T02D2215:223b-32: dga' ba bde ba 'grub pa dang //
T02D2215:223b-33: rtag tu gzhan nas 'bar ba yis //
T02D2215:223b-34: rtse mo las ni 'bar ba dang //
T02D2215:223b-35: gang 'dir byang chub sems dag gi / bzlog pa rlung sngon bskyed pa rang ;
T02D2215:223b-36: /'bar ba rang gi gnas dag tu //
T02D2215:223b-37: gang zhig 'di yis byed pa dag / rnal 'byor bas ni spyad par bya //
T02D2215:223b-39: las kyi rlung bskul sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D2215:223b-40: 'og min gnas nas rab bkug ste //
T02D2215:223b-41: zhing khams brgyad la sogs pa bkug / rnal 'byor ye shes dngos grub 'gyur //
T02D2215:223b-42: rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad kyi //
T02D2215:223b-43: thod pa byang chub sems bkang la //
T02D2215:223b-44: gang gis dmigs pa de dag gis //
T02D2215:223b-45: rtag tu bde ba chen po 'grub //
T02D2215:223b-46: thabs ni kun rnams ma lus pas //
T02D2215:224a-2: sbrul gyi zhags pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2215:224a-4: gang du rnal 'byor ma rnams la //
T02D2215:224a-5: rtag tu bde ba ster byed pa //
T02D2215:224a-6: sna tshogs dpal ldan rdo rje can //
T02D2215:224a-9: gang zhig gtso bo'i sbyor ba la //
T02D2215:224a-10: dmigs nas gsal bar 'gyur ba'i tshe //
T02D2215:224a-11: zhing khams gang dang gang rung bar //
T02D2215:224a-12: sprul pa'i byin rlabs phyogs bcur 'gyed //
T02D2215:224a-13: gang tshe de yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D2215:224a-14: zhing khams yongs su gyur nas ni //
T02D2215:224a-15: thams cad bde ba chen por 'grub //
T02D2215:224a-16: yang na rnal 'byor bde chen por //
T02D2215:224a-17: gsal nas khyab pas spu ldang zhing //
T02D2215:224a-19: rnal 'byor pa ni thams cad kyis //
T02D2215:224a-20: bde ba chen po skyed par byed //
T02D2215:224a-21: yang na 'khor lo'i sbyor spangs pas //
T02D2215:224a-22: gnas ni bzhi'am brgyad dag dang ;
T02D2215:224a-23: / bcu drug gnas su thig le bsgom //
T02D2215:224a-25: rnal 'byor bde ba skyed par byed //
T02D2215:224a-26: gang zhig 'di la rtag gnas na //
T02D2215:224a-27: zla ba drug gam bcu gnyis sam //
T02D2215:224a-28: de las gyur pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2215:224a-30: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02D2215:224a-32: pho nya 'khor tshogs thams cad kyis //
T02D2215:224a-33: rtag tu bde ba ster par byed //
T02D2215:224a-34: bdud dang gnod sbyin la sogs pa //
T02D2215:224a-35: gang gis gnod pa'i tshogs rnams kun //
T02D2215:224a-36: ma lus kun du zhi bar 'gyur //
T02D2215:224a-37: gang zhig don 'di log rtog can //
T02D2215:224a-38: dbyar gyi tsandan lta bu la //
T02D2215:224a-39: gang zhig ster bar 'gyur ba ste //
T02D2215:224a-40: rtag tu brlag par 'gyur ba yin //
T02D2215:224a-41: gsang ba'i don rnams thams cad kun //
T02D2215:224a-42: dri mchog ga bur bzhin du btsa' //
T02D2215:224a-43: gang zhig 'di las log pa la //
T02D2215:224a-44: 'bras bu med cing ngan song ltung ;
T02D2215:224a-45: / mkha' 'gro byad ma srin po dang //
T02D2215:224a-46: ro langs la sogs kun gyis gsod //
T02D2215:224a-47: seng ge'i 'o ma snod nang du //
T02D2215:224a-48: blugs pa ji bzhin dngos grub med //
T02D2215:224a-49: tsandan sbrul gyi snying po bzhin //
T02D2215:224a-50: mkhas pas bstan pa mi ster bar //
T02D2215:224a-51: glegs bam mthong nas khengs 'gyur ba //
T02D2215:224b-0: da @224b la gsang ba bstan mi bya //
T02D2215:224b-1: gang zhig snod ldan ngang tshul can //
T02D2215:224b-2: lus dang longs spyod gtong ba dang //
T02D2215:224b-3: som nyi med cing gsang la dang //
T02D2215:224b-4: sgang bu dma' zhing sems can gsod //
T02D2215:224b-5: rtag tu mkhas pas de la sbyin //
T02D2215:224b-6: bdag 'dra rmongs pas sgrub pa'i thabs 'di brtsams par mi rigs na //
T02D2215:224b-7: sems can don du 'gyur la phan phyir bdag gis brtsams //
T02D2215:224b-8: 'di la nyes par gyur pa ci mchis pa //
T02D2215:224b-9: mkha' dang dam pa rnams la bzod par gsol //
T02D2215:224b-10: bdag gis sgrub pa'i thabs ni brtsams pa'i dge ba yis //
T02D2215:224b-11: gang gis legs gsungs rgyal ba'i bstan pa kun rgyas te //
T02D2215:224b-12: rtag tu bde ba mchog bsgrub dam pa de yi zhal mthong nas //
